inapplicable.help: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

inapplicable.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

inapplicable.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

inapplicable.description: Ensure <dl> elements are structured correctly

inapplicable.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

inapplicable.description: Ensure <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
inapplicable.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

inapplicable.help: Frames must have a unique title attribute

inapplicable.description: Ensure <iframe> and <frame> elements have an accessible name
inapplicable.help: Frames must have an accessible name

inapplicable.help: Input buttons must have discernible text

inapplicable.help: Image buttons must have alternative text

inapplicable.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

inapplicable.help: <object> elements must have alternative text

inapplicable.description: Ensure [role="img"] elements have alternative text
inapplicable.help: [role="img"] elements must have an alternative text

<button class="ai-ask-button btn btn-sm border-2 btn-outline-red-400 border-red-400 btn-sm btn-outline-red-400 border-red-400 px-sm-5 px-md-10 js-inline-ai-ask-button">
    Ask the Chatbot a Question
	</button>
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.76 (foreground color: #f87171, background color: #ffffff, font size: 10.5pt (14px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

violations.recommendedFix: Increase contrast between foreground and background colors to meet WCAG AA ratio (4.5:1 for normal text). Use a contrast-checker and adjust CSS variables.

any.message: Element does not have an alt attribute
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
Element has no title attribute
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty
  Element has no title attribute
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none" or role="presentation"

violations.recommendedFix: Add descriptive alt text to images that convey meaning. Avoid using empty alt attributes for informative images.

violations.description: Links must be distinguishable without relying on color

any.message: The link has insufficient color contrast of 2.44:1 with the surrounding text. (Minimum contrast is 3:1, link text: #14599d, surrounding text: #1a1a1a)
The link has no styling (such as underline) to distinguish it from the surrounding text
